summary: Full version of the Whiterun Catacombs Hotel!
descriptionHtml:
Contents:
- Lobby
- Innkeeper (all new stand-alone charactor named Derryl)
- All new stand-alone quest
- A room
- Daedric Statues (In Room)
- An all new stand-alone enchanted amulet (quest reward)
- Fully usable beds
- Fully usable chair/table
- Got rid of pesky skeletons in "Lobby"

Installation:
- Download and extract .zip file
- Place the .esp file in your data folder (usually located in: "C:\Program Files\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\Data")
- Start Skyrim
- Make sure .esp file is active via Data Files on startup menu
- Enjoy the mod!

Known bugs:
- Sometimes the door to the room exports locked to "requires a key", just use the console (tilde key) and type "unlock" after targeting the door.
- If you have a bounty in Markarth the beds may ask if you if want to serve your time, it WILL teleport you to Markarth outside of Cidna mine and you won't have a bounty.
author: Sion171
